abstract: Investigation by Virginia's Alcoholic Beverage Control Dept finds that three liquor agents acted according to protocol during arrest of black University of Virginia student Martese Johnson; video of incident, in which Johnson can be seen bleeding after he was pinned to sidewalk, had prompted allegations of racism.
lead_paragraph: A state agency said three liquor agents involved in a bloody arrest that prompted allegations of racism followed procedures and did nothing wrong.

headline.main: Virginia: Liquor Agents Are Cleared in Arrest That Sparked an Uproar
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Liquor Agents Are Cleared in Arrest That Sparked an Uproar

snippet: A state agency said three liquor agents involved in a bloody arrest that prompted allegations of racism followed procedures and did nothing wrong.

keywords.value: Virginia Department of Alcoholic Beverage Control
